properties.Name: CalendarPeriod
properties.Description: A calendar period is used to define a set of calendar dates which belong to the calendar period.  This set up dates is separate from the more conventional week, quarter view but can also be used in conjunction with it.

Columns.Name: CalendarId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Calendar.

Columns.Name: CalendarPeriodId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Calendar Period.

Columns.Name: CalendarPeriodName
Columns.Description: The name of the associated calendar period.

Columns.Name: CalendarPeriodDescription
Columns.Description: The description of the calendar period.

Columns.Name: CalendarPeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The start date of the calendar period.

Columns.Name: CalendarPeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The end date of the calendar period.

Columns.Name: CalendarPeriodNumber
Columns.Description: The period number associated with the calendar period.

Columns.Name: CalendarWeekId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Calendar Week.

Columns.Name: CalendarMonthId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a calendar month.

Columns.Name: CalendarQuarterId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a calendar quarter.

Columns.Name: CalendarYearId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Calendar Year.

Properties.Description: A calendar period is used to define a set of calendar dates which belong to the calendar period.  This set up dates is separate from the more conventional week, quarter view but can also be used in conjunction with it.
